member.name: T:MG.Posh.Extensions.Pipe.PipedObjectExtensions

member.summary: Tries to return the object sent to this from the pipeline setting an out variable if one exists. A value indicates there was an object received. A value indicates no object was found or the cmdlet was first in the pipeline.
